title: RIP-6 | Distribute $RETOKEN ASAP | if under 1k total for that distro
body:
# Overview
We want to get more $RETOKEN to our community members ASAP.

I propose that for any $RETOKEN airdrop that is < 1k in total distributed $RETOKEN that airdrop can be executed same day and itemized within the Weekly TDP (Treasury Distribution Proposal).

This will be extremely helpful for regularly reoccurring activities (IE: Community Calls, Core Team Weekly Planning Sessions, Working Groups, etc) where we already have established agreed upon token rewards for those activities.

> ## NOTE:
> *Will be creating an additional proposal to clearly communicate and document, what these current opportunities to earn $RETOKEN.  This will also be discussed on Sunday's **Core Team Weekly Planning Session**.*

## Airdrops LiveStream / Videos
[@Yonks](https://twitter.com/Yonks) will likely utilize these more frequent airdrops to occur via quick LiveStream videos (extra content for YouTube / Facebook / LinkedIn etc)

This also supports our ***Full transparency*** Founding Principle (see [Genesis Proposal](https://snapshot.org/#/retokendao.eth/proposal/QmdJUQkW6dNWfuT5BZbx1qWzopgbpEFom1xaVsVCQCT7UD)).

### Airdrops | YouTube Links
* [YouTube Playlist: $RETOKEN Airdrops | REtoken | The Real Estate DAO](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLwM_BAoI8hnazAXNg-aiU3W8lULrmRJEt)
* [YouTube: $RETOKEN Airdrops | Thu | 04Nov2021 | REtoken | The Real Estate DAO](https://youtu.be/u5yder-POC4)
* [YouTube: $RETOKEN Airdrops via Coinvise.co | Sun / 24Oct2021 | REtoken | The Real Estate DAO](https://youtu.be/Dc1lYLzv6CI)
* [YouTube: $RETOKEN Airdrop | How To Join TokenTown "The HOA Destroyer" by REtoken | The Real Estate DAO](https://youtu.be/zHmxPcpEsDc)

# $RETOKEN Distribution Workflow
1) Activity / Events occur that reward $RETOKEN
2) Capture screenshot of event attendance and share in Discord thread / Trello card for that activity
3) Itemize Weekly TDP Trello Card
4) Update REtoken Google Sheet Season 0 Tracker
5) Complete Airdrop using Coinvise.co and provide relevant description

# $RETOKEN Token Policy
The current $RETOKEN token policy can be found:

* [GitHub.com/REtokenDAO | Legal - Operating Agreement](https://github.com/REtokenDAO/Legal/blob/main/Operating-Agreement.md)
* [Snapshot.org: RIP-1 | Genesis Proposal (Season 0)](https://snapshot.org/#/retokendao.eth/proposal/QmdJUQkW6dNWfuT5BZbx1qWzopgbpEFom1xaVsVCQCT7UD)

# Additional Related Links

## Discord "Temp Check" Vote
* https://discord.com/channels/877883581903564860/882418077004877834/900518433341452288

## Trello Card
* https://trello.com/c/B0nPnmv2

# Vote
* Yes - Distro $RETOKEN faster
* No - Slower is OK
